title: Strengthening Deep Learning Competencies: Flipped Learning-Based Workshop for Advanced Mathematics Learning Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: In a flipped learning environment, students autonomously perform the mathematical problem-solving process at least 80% of the time.
Through collaborative learning activities with peers, students propose at least three multidimensional approaches to complex mathematical problems.
Students achieve at least 75 points (out of 100) on formative assessments that apply learning content in digital platform-based interactions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
